name: sbid2vw
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0
body: |- wb(wsb(s0, s1, wsb(s1, s0, w0)), w0)

body.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, wsb(s1, s0, w0)), w0)
-| wb(wsb(s0, s1, wsb(s1, s0, w0)), wsb(s0, s0, w0))
-| wb(wsb(s0, s0, w0), w0)

body.origin:

-| diffsw(s1, w0)

cumulated.origin:

comment: Reverting substitution yields the original expression. Based on fewer axioms than ~ sbid2v , at the expense of an extra distinct variable condition. (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 5-Aug-2023.)
